EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-06-15-5.6 Release Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending The VMTurbo 5.6 Release Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending the VMTurbo 5.5 Release Webinar. We hope you left with some useful takeaways!
Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-vmturbo-5-6-release-webinar/]]>.
You can also download and follow along with the slides here <[[http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/5.6-Webinar.pdf]]>.
If you have not already please take 30 seconds to fill out our brief webinar survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/MSMDTT6]]> and let us know what you thought!
If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <[[mailto:evalteam@vmturbo.com]]>. - The VMTurbo Team
